attributes.action: introduce legislation to establish a Bill of Rights for UK Taxpayers so that when they refuse to hand over hard earned money to our government merely for it to be stolen by corrupt politicians who consider themselves above the law because of their own Bill of Rights, those taxpayers CANNOT be dealt with by the criminal courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is immoral that those whom we trust to represent us put themselves above the law to facilitate the theft of our income tax contributions to fund their lavish tax free lifestyles, are the very same people who we have to ask to establish a Bill of Rights for us, so that we may deny them access to money which they intend to steal anyway!

rejection.details: It is not clear what action you are requesting the government take. Please rephrase your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
